title: Jason Kelce’s Bold New Hair Steals Spotlight From Taylor Swift’s Announcement
description: Fans were 'so distracted' from Swift's album news by the former NFL player's new look.
content:

Jason Kelce’s Bold New Hair Steals Spotlight From Taylor Swift’s Announcement originally appeared on Parade.

Fans of Taylor Swift and the Kelce brothers were thrilled to learn about Swift's upcoming album, The Life of a Showgirl, with a sneak clip from the New Heights podcast, but some were a bit distracted by a surprising detail in the video about Jason Kelce.

In the new video shared by the podcast in the early morning of Aug. 12, Travis Kelce and Swift revealed the first look at her upcoming 12th album, with Jason excitedly reacting to the big news.

But rather than the album news, the detail that drew some fans' attention was Jason's bold new hair, with the former football star's beard and hair dyed much darker than usual. Fans highlighted the change in the comments, questioning the major transformation.

Related: Taylor Swift Fans Suspect New Album The Life of a Showgirl Has Direct Connection to Another Highly Anticipated Project

In the comments on the video posted to Facebook, one fan wrote, "Anyone else so distracted by Jason's darker hair, brows and beard instead of what's in the box?!"

"Not a Swiftie here… I just want to know why Jason colored his beard 🤔," said another, while a third commented, "Has Jason dyed his hair??"

Someone else lamented the change, writing, "Jason c'mon, salt n pepper is in now and you were leading the charge for us guys!"

After the video was released, Jason addressed the questions about his hair on X, replying to a comment by saying, "I promise the dye was for a good reason, don’t hate me," but he didn't share any more information about the big change.

Next: Taylor Swift Teases Possible First Lyrics From New Album

Jason Kelce’s Bold New Hair Steals Spotlight From Taylor Swift’s Announcement first appeared on Parade on Aug 12, 2025

This story was originally reported by Parade on Aug 12, 2025, where it first appeared.

The news of Taylor Swift's upcoming album, The Life of a Showgirl, was shared in a video by Taylor Swift and her brothers, Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift. However, some fans were distracted by Jason Kelce's bold new hair, which was significantly dyed darker than usual, raising questions about the transformation. After the video was released, Kelce responded to the questions by saying the dye was for a good reason and not revealing more details about the major transformation.
shortSummary: Jason Kelce's bold new hair stole the spotlight from Taylor Swift's album announcement, prompting mixed reactions from fans and tech enthusiasts.
argos_summary: Fans were excited about Taylor Swift's announcement of her upcoming album, The Life of a Showgirl, during a video from the New Heights podcast featuring the Kelce brothers. However, many viewers were more intrigued by Jason Kelce's bold new hair and beard, which he dyed darker than usual, prompting numerous comments and questions about the change. Jason acknowledged the attention on his hair on social media but did not provide further details about the transformation.
